thread.section_title: Timhotel Paris Place D'Italie - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Remote location but close to metro
thread.title_full: Remote location but close to metro - Review of Timhotel Paris Place D'Italie, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Raanan T
title: Remote location but close to metro
text:
It can be right choice if the price you get is good. We stayed there with around 130$ per night while most of other hotels were much more expensive
The hotel facilities are basic but clean, looks like just renovated and rooms are relatively big for Paris.
OK breakfast, no complains...
Certainly recommended if you are not looking to stay in the near attractions area like saint Germain
It across the street from metro that take you anywhere in minutes.
